metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0217 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
filter/mediaplugin/filter.php in Moodle through 2.5.9, 2.6.x before 2.6.7,2.7.x before 2.7.4, and 2.8.x before 2.8.2 allows remote authenticatedusers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption or partial outage) viaa crafted string that is matched against an improper regular expression.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0217` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: moodle package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1').
